name: Observations
description:
Observations is a slower paced puzzle game in a similar vein of 'The Witness'. The project is created in Unreal Engine 4 and was completed as a solo project.

Unravel the mystery in a world that solely tells the story through the environment. Discover the meaning and history of all that you see before you and explore the beautiful world of Observations.

Sound effects attributed to https://www.freesound.org

Music attributed to Elias Nilsson https://www.eliasnilsson.bandcamp.com
